mapper.sql: pdt_code, pdt_sht_desc, pdt_description, pdt_unt_code, pdt_loc_code, pdt_sloc_code, pdt_cat_code, pdt_min_level, pdt_max_level, pdt_bp, pdt_sp, pdt_profit_pct, pdt_vat_id, pdt_status, pdt_strength, pdt_current_qty, pdt_amount, pdt_op_qty, pdt_delete_by, pdt_delete_date
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from inv_products
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into inv_products (pdt_code, pdt_sht_desc, pdt_description, pdt_unt_code, pdt_loc_code, pdt_sloc_code, pdt_cat_code, pdt_min_level, pdt_max_level, pdt_bp, pdt_sp, pdt_profit_pct, pdt_vat_id, pdt_status, pdt_strength, pdt_current_qty, pdt_amount, pdt_op_qty, pdt_delete_by, pdt_delete_date) values (#{pdtCode,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{pdtShtDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pdtDescription,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pdtUntCode,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{pdtLocCode,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{pdtSlocCode,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{pdtCatCode,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{pdtMinLevel,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{pdtMaxLevel,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{pdtBp,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{pdtSp,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{pdtProfitPct,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{pdtVatId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pdtStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pdtStrength,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pdtCurrentQty,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{pdtAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{pdtOpQty,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{pdtDeleteBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pdtDeleteDate,jdbcType=DATE})

mapper.update:
update inv_products
pdt_code = #{record.pdtCode,jdbcType=INTEGER},
pdt_sht_desc = #{record.pdtShtDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pdt_description = #{record.pdtDescription,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pdt_unt_code = #{record.pdtUntCode,jdbcType=INTEGER},
pdt_loc_code = #{record.pdtLocCode,jdbcType=INTEGER},
pdt_sloc_code = #{record.pdtSlocCode,jdbcType=INTEGER},
pdt_cat_code = #{record.pdtCatCode,jdbcType=INTEGER},
pdt_min_level = #{record.pdtMinLevel,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
pdt_max_level = #{record.pdtMaxLevel,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
pdt_bp = #{record.pdtBp,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
pdt_sp = #{record.pdtSp,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
pdt_profit_pct = #{record.pdtProfitPct,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
pdt_vat_id = #{record.pdtVatId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pdt_status = #{record.pdtStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pdt_strength = #{record.pdtStrength,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pdt_current_qty = #{record.pdtCurrentQty,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
pdt_amount = #{record.pdtAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
pdt_op_qty = #{record.pdtOpQty,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
pdt_delete_by = #{record.pdtDeleteBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pdt_delete_date = #{record.pdtDeleteDate,jdbcType=DATE},

update inv_products set pdt_code = #{record.pdtCode,jdbcType=INTEGER}, pdt_sht_desc = #{record.pdtShtDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pdt_description = #{record.pdtDescription,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pdt_unt_code = #{record.pdtUntCode,jdbcType=INTEGER}, pdt_loc_code = #{record.pdtLocCode,jdbcType=INTEGER}, pdt_sloc_code = #{record.pdtSlocCode,jdbcType=INTEGER}, pdt_cat_code = #{record.pdtCatCode,jdbcType=INTEGER}, pdt_min_level = #{record.pdtMinLevel,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, pdt_max_level = #{record.pdtMaxLevel,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, pdt_bp = #{record.pdtBp,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, pdt_sp = #{record.pdtSp,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, pdt_profit_pct = #{record.pdtProfitPct,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, pdt_vat_id = #{record.pdtVatId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pdt_status = #{record.pdtStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pdt_strength = #{record.pdtStrength,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pdt_current_qty = #{record.pdtCurrentQty,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, pdt_amount = #{record.pdtAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, pdt_op_qty = #{record.pdtOpQty,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, pdt_delete_by = #{record.pdtDeleteBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pdt_delete_date = #{record.pdtDeleteDate,jdbcType=DATE}

update inv_products
pdt_sht_desc = #{pdtShtDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pdt_description = #{pdtDescription,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pdt_unt_code = #{pdtUntCode,jdbcType=INTEGER},
pdt_loc_code = #{pdtLocCode,jdbcType=INTEGER},
pdt_sloc_code = #{pdtSlocCode,jdbcType=INTEGER},
pdt_cat_code = #{pdtCatCode,jdbcType=INTEGER},
pdt_min_level = #{pdtMinLevel,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
pdt_max_level = #{pdtMaxLevel,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
pdt_bp = #{pdtBp,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
pdt_sp = #{pdtSp,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
pdt_profit_pct = #{pdtProfitPct,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
pdt_vat_id = #{pdtVatId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pdt_status = #{pdtStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pdt_strength = #{pdtStrength,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pdt_current_qty = #{pdtCurrentQty,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
pdt_amount = #{pdtAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
pdt_op_qty = #{pdtOpQty,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
pdt_delete_by = #{pdtDeleteBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pdt_delete_date = #{pdtDeleteDate,jdbcType=DATE},
where pdt_code = #{pdtCode,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update inv_products set pdt_sht_desc = #{pdtShtDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pdt_description = #{pdtDescription,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pdt_unt_code = #{pdtUntCode,jdbcType=INTEGER}, pdt_loc_code = #{pdtLocCode,jdbcType=INTEGER}, pdt_sloc_code = #{pdtSlocCode,jdbcType=INTEGER}, pdt_cat_code = #{pdtCatCode,jdbcType=INTEGER}, pdt_min_level = #{pdtMinLevel,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, pdt_max_level = #{pdtMaxLevel,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, pdt_bp = #{pdtBp,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, pdt_sp = #{pdtSp,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, pdt_profit_pct = #{pdtProfitPct,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, pdt_vat_id = #{pdtVatId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pdt_status = #{pdtStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pdt_strength = #{pdtStrength,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pdt_current_qty = #{pdtCurrentQty,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, pdt_amount = #{pdtAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, pdt_op_qty = #{pdtOpQty,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, pdt_delete_by = #{pdtDeleteBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pdt_delete_date = #{pdtDeleteDate,jdbcType=DATE} where pdt_code = #{pdtCode,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
select pdt_code, pdt_sht_desc, pdt_description, pdt_unt_code, pdt_loc_code, pdt_sloc_code, pdt_cat_code, pdt_min_level, pdt_max_level, pdt_bp, pdt_sp, pdt_profit_pct, pdt_vat_id, pdt_status, pdt_strength, pdt_current_qty, pdt_amount, pdt_op_qty, pdt_delete_by, pdt_delete_date,cat_sht_desc,loc_sht_desc,sloc_sht_desc,unt_sht_desc from inv_products left join inv_categories on inv_categories.cat_code = inv_products.pdt_cat_code left join inv_locations on inv_locations.loc_code = inv_products.pdt_loc_code left join inv_sub_locations on inv_sub_locations.sloc_code = inv_products.pdt_sloc_code left join inv_units on inv_units.unt_code = inv_products.pdt_unt_code
where inv_products.pdt_code= #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select
from inv_products
where ((pdt_description LIKE '%' + #{searchData,jdbcType=VARCHAR} + '%') OR(pdt_sht_desc LIKE '%' + #{searchData,jdbcType=VARCHAR} + '%'))
